title: The Honey Keys - Book 1: Six Sizzling Scenarios of Sexual Submission.
description: Six sizzling scenarios of sexual submission. If you like your erotica hotter than hot then look no further than these scintillating fantasies from the pen of Tilly Andrews. The scenarios contained in this collection are: Snap Shot, Private Dancer, Master and Maid, The Peeper, Hide and Seek and Company.  For adventurous adults only. Tilly does not write for persons under the age of 18.
author: Tilly Andrews
